title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Enhancing Pakistani University Teaching Practices Through Practitioner Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Explain at least three key characteristics of Pakistani university teaching methods (assessment systems, learning activities, instructional strategies)
Describe in five steps the procedure for diagnosing teaching-learning environments using survey design and factor analysis techniques
Propose instructional strategies for transitioning from knowledge-transmission-centered to competency-development-centered approaches in applicable educational settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
